mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (origin,cultivation_type, product_name, product_image, description, product_status, store_id) VALUE (#{origin}, #{cultivationType},#{productName}, #{productImage}, #{description}, #{productStatus}, #{storeId})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET origin = #{origin}, product_name = #{productName}, product_image = #{productImage}, description = #{description}, product_status = #{productStatus} WHERE product_id = #{productId}
